text:
38 Perfect Valentine's Day Cards For Your BFF For all the women you love in a platonic life partner kind of way ðŸ’• 02/01/2017 09:06 am ET Alanna Vagianos Women's Editor, The Huffington Post 
Valentineâ€™s Day is a holiday to celebrate everyone you love in your life, not just significant others â€• and that includes your best friends. 
So whether youâ€™re taken, single or simply DGAF about this holiday, here are 38 hilarious cards to help you celebrate. 1 For the friend who needs a little pick-me-up.
